mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (post_number, category_number, user_number, post_name, admin_post, content, create_time, suggestion_count, view) VALUES (#{postNumber}, #{categoryNumber}, #{userNumber}, #{postName}, #{adminPost}, #{content}, #{createTime}, #{suggestionCount}, #{view})
mapper.select: SELECT post_number, view, suggestion_count, create_time FROM rank_posts
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rank_posts (post_number, view, suggestion_count, create_time) SELECT post_number, view, suggestion_count, create_time FROM posts ORDER BY suggestion_count DESC, view DESC, create_time desc LIMIT 10
